name: Comandeffect
body:
#Nie usuwaj informacji o autorach
#Nie podszywaj sie pod autorow
 
variables:
    {efekty.%player%.ilosc} = 0
 
options:
    PktZabicieMin: 1
    PktZabicieMax: 3
 
command /efekt [<text>] [<text>]:
    trigger:
        arg 1 is "fireprot" or "fp":
            arg 2 is "kup":
                player has permission "efekt.ochrona.kup" or "efekty.VIP.kup":
                    {efekty.%player%.ilosc} is greater than 10:
                        apply fire resistance to the player for 480 seconds
                        send "&6* &7Otrzymales &6Ochrone przed Ogniem &7na &c8 Minut &7!"
                        remove 10 from {efekty.%player%.ilosc}
                        stop
                    else:
                        send "&6* &7Brakuje ci punktow zeby to kupic !"
                        stop
        arg 1 is "regeneracja" or "rege":
            arg 2 is "kup":
                player has permission "efekt.regeneracja.kup" or "efekty.VIP.kup":
                    {efekty.%player%.ilosc} is greater than 15:
                        apply regeneration to the player for 480 seconds
                        send "&6* &7Otrzymales &dRegeneracje &7na &c8 Minut &7!"
                        remove 15 from {efekty.%player%.ilosc}
                        stop
                    else:
                        send "&6* &7Brakuje ci punktow zeby to kupic !"
                        stop
        arg 1 is "punkty" or "p" or "pkt":
            player has permission "efekt.punkty.sprawdz":
                send "&6* &7Twoje Punkty : &c%{efekty.%player%.zabicia}%"
                stop
        arg 1 is "sila":
            arg 2 is "kup":
                player has permission "efekt.sila.kup" or "efekty.VIP.kup":
                    {ochrona.kup.%player%.zabicia} is greater than 10:
                        apply strength to the player for 480 seconds
                        send "&6* &7Otrzymales &4Sile &7na &c8 minut&7 !"
                        remove 10 from {ochrona.kup.%player%.zabicia}
                        stop
                    else:
                        send "&6* &7Brakuje ci punktow zeby to kupic !"
                        stop
        arg 1 is "help":
            arg 2 is not set:
                player has permission "efekt.help":
                    send "&8------------------[ &9CommandEfect &8]------------------"
                    send "&3/efekt fireprot kup &7- Kupujesz ochrone przed ogniem na 8 Minut"
                    send "&3/efekt sila kup &7- Kupujesz sile na 8 min"
                    send "&3/efekt protection kup &7- Kupujesz ochrone na 8 Minut"
                    send "&3/efekt tworca &7- Wszyscy tworcy skryptu"
                    stop
        arg 1 is "autor" or "tworca":
            send "&8------------------[ &9CommandEfect &8]------------------"
            send "&3Tworcy &7: eX. i duchdamian [DjDuch]"
            send "&3Wersja &7: 0.1"
            stop
        if arg 1 is not set:
            if arg 2 is not set:
                make player execute command "efekt help"
                stop
   
on death:
    if attacker is a player:
        if victim is a player:
            set {EfektPunkty} to random integer between {@PktZabicieMin} and {@PktZabicieMax}
            wait 2 tick
            add {EfektPunkty} to {ochrona.kup.%attacker%.zabicia}
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
